resources.string:
In Zombie Land game zombies are randomly hidden on the game board.
 The Goal - find all the zombies using minimum number of scans.
 Tap on a cell to inspect ,if the cell contains a zombie it is revealed. If no zombie , a scan which shows the count of hidden mines in the same row and column as the selected cell.
 All the pngs and the background image have been taken from https://imgbin.com/
Created by Sehajvir S. Pannu and Gursmeep S. Syan. CMPT 276 : https://opencoursehub.cs.sfu.ca/bfraser/grav-cms/cmpt276/home
